statements: SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_start_date FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_id, payout_amount FROM contracts WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT contract_name, contract_end_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, payout_amount, premium_amount, (payout_amount - premium_amount) AS profit FROM contracts;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contract_name, contract_start_date, payout_amount FROM contracts WHERE payout_amount > 5000 ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(premium_amount) AS average_premium FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_name, insured_address FROM contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE '%insurance%';
SELECT contract_id, contract_start_date, DATEDIFF(contract_end_date, contract_start_date) AS contract_duration FROM contracts WHERE contract_duration > 365;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_details FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, creation_date FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM contract_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'parameter1';
SELECT contract_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM contract_parameters ORDER BY contract_id ASC, parameter_name DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_details FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM smart_contracts INNER JOIN contract_parameters ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_parameters.contract_id;

SELECT contract_name, COUNT(parameter_id) AS parameter_count FROM smart_contracts LEFT JOIN contract_parameters ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_parameters.contract_id GROUP BY smart_contracts.contract_name;
SELECT contract_name, contract_details, MAX(creation_date) AS latest_creation_date FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY creation_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_name, creator_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY contract_name ASC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE creator_address = '0x123456789' LIMIT 5;
SELECT platform_name, platform_address FROM insurance_platforms WHERE platform_name = 'Platform A';
SELECT * FROM contract_parameters WHERE parameter_type = 'string' ORDER BY parameter_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE creator_address = '0x6a20B0c9c169dFbCcD4573a290d8EaC34b335B86';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, creation_timestamp FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_address LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY creation_timestamp DESC;

SELECT pc.parameter_name, pc.parameter_type, cp.parameter_value FROM contract_parameters cp JOIN smart_contracts sc ON cp.contract_id = sc.contract_id WHERE sc.contract_name = 'Example Contract' AND pc.parameter_type = 'string';

SELECT ip.platform_name, COUNT(sc.contract_id) AS contract_count FROM insurance_platforms ip JOIN smart_contracts sc ON JSON_CONTAINS(ip.supported_contracts, JSON_QUOTE(sc.contract_id)) GROUP BY ip.platform_name ORDER BY contract_count DESC;

SELECT sc.contract_name, cp.parameter_name, cp.parameter_value FROM smart_contracts sc JOIN contract_parameters cp ON sc.contract_id = cp.contract_id WHERE cp.parameter_type = 'number' ORDER BY cp.parameter_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_balance FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_balance > 1000;
SELECT platform_name, platform_address FROM insurance_platforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_balance, contract_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_balance < 5000 ORDER BY contract_id ASC;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM contract_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%date%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts
SELECT contract_name, contract_balance FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_balance > 1000
SELECT sc.*, cp.parameter_name FROM smart_contracts sc INNER JOIN contract_parameters cp ON sc.contract_id = cp.contract_id
SELECT sc.contract_name, ip.platform_name FROM smart_contracts sc, insurance_platforms ip, platform_contracts pc WHERE sc.contract_id = pc.contract_id AND pc.platform_id = ip.platform_id
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM SmartContracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_address, deploy_date FROM SmartContracts ORDER BY deploy_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM SmartContracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_type = 'participant';
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM Documents WHERE document_type = 'pdf';
SELECT * FROM SmartContracts ORDER BY deploy_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_name, contract_address, deploy_date FROM SmartContracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_address, user_type FROM Users WHERE user_type = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE status = 'active' AND premium > 1000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY claim_date ASC LIMIT 3;
